content: needles take up 1 st out of third finger = 9 sts continue in plain knitting until finger measures 5 5 cm then k2tog for 1 round cut off yarn and pull through remaining stitches the thumb slip all 10 sts from the stitch holder onto needles take up 2 sts out of hand = 12 sts continue in plain knitting until thumb measures 6 cm then k2tog for 1 round cut off yarn and pull through remaining stitches weave in all ends making sure to close any gaps that may have formed at base of fingers left hand glove work as given for right hand glove but place thumb gusset on last 4 sts of round p1 k2 p1 after slipping stitches for thumb gusset onto stitch holder leave the new 4 sts on last needle do not transfer them to the first needle as before continue knitting the fingers as given © for modifications of the original pattern selyn84
